thread.title: Tom Hanks' granddaughter's name revealed | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Tom Hanks' granddaughter's name revealed | Daily Mail Online

author: Chelsea White For Dailymail.Com
title: Tom Hanks' granddaughter's name revealed | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 91 shares Michaiah - who turned one last month - was dressed in an Oakland Raiders' T-shirt dress with denim jeans and lace-up shoes. Chet had proudly posted a snap of himself picking out the dress last month. Tidy up: The child's mom, Tiffany Miles, took out the trash as the 13-month-old spent some time with the nanny Too cute: The toddler could not stop smiling and giggling to herself as her babysitter took her for a walk He said at the time: 'Like Father Like Daughter Only the best for my baby girl #DontCareThatTheyreMovingToVegas #StillRaiderNation #CornyDadPic.' Chet is certainly a lucky man as little Michaiah is too cute for words. The little one was carried by her babysitter as her mom took the bins out, and the toddler could not stop smiling and giggling to herself. It was revealed in December that Chet was a father - Tom and Rita Wilson's third grandchild. Dad's pick: Michaiah - who turned one last month - was dressed in an Oakland Raiders' T-shirt dress with denim jeans and lace-up shoes Proud papa: Chet had proudly posted a snap of himself picking out the dress last month Chet has since released a video saying his new daughter has inspired him to deal once-and-for-all with his alcohol-and-drug issues and lead a sober life. He said: 'I want to share something today because it's about to be shared anyway in the press, which is the fact that I have a daughter. 'I do have a daughter, she's the best thing that's ever happened to me, she's the reason why I turned my life around and got sober. I've been sober for over a year and a half from everything. 'It hasn't been easy making all my mistakes in public but I'm figuring it out. 'I'm doing the best that I can,' Chet added. Turned a corner: It was revealed in December that Chet (pictured last year) was a father and he has since revealed the baby inspired him to get sober And although he is not thought to be in a relationship any longer with Tiffany, he said of her in a separate post that she is 'one of the nicest people I know. He added: 'I'm just thankful that my daughter has such a great mom.' The new baby means Tom and wife Rita Wilson are grandparents for a third time. Family affair: Tom, Chet and Rita are shown in December 2011 in New York City Tom's son Colin, who he had with first wife Samantha Lewes, have two children: Olivia, five, and Charlotte, three. According to reports, the grandkids call Tom 'pappou' and Rita 'yia yia' because of Rita's Greek heritage. Tom and Rita also have 21-year-old son Truman together. Good times: Truman Hanks, his father Tom and brother Chet are shown in March 2015 catching a hockey game in New York City Read more: Share or comment on this article 91
